import React,{useState} from 'react' import Logo from '../../images/book1.png' import './Header.css' function Header() { const [activeInput,setActiveInput] = useState('inputSearch') const handleActiveInput = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() activeInput === 'inputSearch' ? setActiveInput('inputSearch active-input-search') : setActiveInput('inputSearch') } const [toggle,setToggle] = useState('toggle-button') const handleToggle = () =>{ toggle === 'toggle-button' ? setToggle('toggle-button toggle-bars') : setToggle('toggle-button') } return (
  • Home

) } export default Header
